area_footnote: (without Crimea) {{Refn|group|=|note|name|=|"Areanote"|When including the [[Republic of Crimea]] and [[Sevastopol]], the total area of Russia rises to |convinfobox|17125191|km2|sqmi|ref|{{cite web|url=https://rosreestr.ru/upload/Doc/18-upr/%D0%A1%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%8F%20%D0%BF%D0%BE%20%D1%84.22%20%D0%B7%D0%B0%202016%20%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B4%20(%D0%BF%D0%BE%20%D1%81%D1%83%D0%B1%D1%8A%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BC%20%D0%A0%D0%A4)_%D0%BD%D0%B0%20%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%B9%D1%82.doc |script-title=ru:Сведения о наличии и распределении земель в Российской Федерации на 1 January 2017 (в разрезе субъектов Российской Федерации)|title=Information about avaliability and distribution of land in the Russian Federation as of 1 January 2017 (by federal subjects of Russia|website=[[Rosreestr]]}}|</ref>}} {{convinfobox|17125191|km2|sqmi}}
